parameters.name: DBClusterIds
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster. If you need to specify multiple cluster IDs, separate the cluster IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be an integer that is larger than 0 and does not exceed the maximum value of the INTEGER data type. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 30, 50, and 100. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~98041~~) operation to query the region ID details.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
